price: Ɔno na Ɔma nkwa εna Ɔma (abͻdeε a εwͻ nkwa) wuo. Enti sε Ɔhyehyε biribi a, deε Ɔka kyerε (adeε) no ne sε: Yε! na ayε.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُحۡيِۦ وَيُمِيتُۖ فَإِذَا قَضَىٰٓ أَمۡرٗا فَإِنَّمَا يَقُولُ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī yuḥ'yī wayumītu fa-idhā qaḍā amran fa-innamā yaqūlu lahu kun fayakūnu
